scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:ejs
scripts.test: postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-cssnext --postcss-cssnext.features.customProperties.preserve 'true' -u postcss-style-guide --postcss-style-guide.dest 'test/output.html' --postcss-style-guide.project 'Greek Fire!' --postcss-style-guide.themePath '.' test/index.css
